General.Name: Shanghai Laimu Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Laimu Electronics Co., Ltd researches and develops, produces, and sells precision electronic components in China. Its products include automotive electronics, such as injection and stamping parts, connectors, injection inserts, and wire harnesses; and mobile electronics, including T-cards, battery holders, combo decks, shields, hardware parts, nuts, shrapnel, and camera modules, as well as components for SIMs and USBs. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 88, Lane 651, Dongxue Road, Shanghai, China, 201619
